attributes.action: Retain the Ceremonial Bearksin of Her Majesty's Guards in its current pattern and material
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Retain the Bearskin and other ceremonial accoutrements of Her Majesty's Guards in their current pattern and material.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
